name: Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park
description: Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park is a 2,965 acre National Battlefield that preserves a Civil War battleground of the Atlanta Campaign. Opposing forces maneuvered and fought here from June 19, 1864 until July 2, 1864. Although most famous as a Civil War battlefield, Kennesaw Mountain has a much richer story.
shortDescription: Kennesaw Mountain National Battlefield Park is a 2,965 acre National Battlefield that preserves a Civil War battleground of the Atlanta Campaign. Opposing forces maneuvered and fought here from June 1...

operatingHours.description:
Kennesaw Mountain NBP is open from 6:30 AM - 8:30 PM during Daylight Saving Time (March - November) and 6:30 AM - 6:30 PM Standard Time (December - February) 

These hours apply to all trails and parking lots.*
*Cheatham Hill Parking Lot opens at 8:00 am

fees.title: Entrance - Private Vehicle
fees.description: The Daily Pass is valid for the date of purchase only. It admits all persons traveling in a single, private, non-commercial vehicle (car/truck/van) and is non-transferable. This pass does NOT guarantee a parking spot.

fees.title: Entrance - Per Person
fees.description: The Daily Pass is valid for the date of purchase only. It admits all walk-in visitors aged 16 and older.

fees.title: Entrance - Education/Academic Groups
fees.description: To request an Academic Fee Waiver for your group, click on the link for further details.

fees.title: Commercial Entrance - Motor Coach
fees.description: $100 Motor Coach/Commercial Tour Groups with 26 or more people

climate.weatherDescription: Before you start your trip to the mountain, check the local weather forecast to be sure that you will have a dry time. Though we are located north of Atlanta, we're still have the same hot summers and mild winters as our neighbors. The mountain top generally ranges 8-10 degrees cooler than at the base. In fall and winter, be prepared with a light weight jacket on hand. After planning your activities, check back to see what the weather will have in store for your day.

images.caption: Cannon with front field and Visitor Center in background.

images.title: Sunset on the Mountain
